The size and weight of the suitcase may be an issue when bringing it on a plane. Airlines often have restrictions on the size and weight of luggage passengers can bring on board. Additionally, some items may be prohibited from being carried in the cabin, such as sharp objects, liquids, and aerosols.
The size of the duffel bag may exceed the maximum size allowed by the airline. Additionally, the cat may not be allowed to travel in the cabin and must be placed in a pet carrier.
